body.text:
{"query":"query {
	patients: getAllPatients {
    id
    socialCareNumber
    idCard
    name
    surname
    birthDate
    genre
    username
    role
    token
    lastLoginAt
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    enabled
    deceased
    medicalHistory {
      socialCareNumber
      medicalReports {
        bindToReport
        department
        reportType
        reportDate
        signedBy
        verification {
          required
          requiredTo
          verifiedBy
          verifiedAt
          notes
        }
        content
        attachedTests
      }
    }
	}
}"}
